about.title: About
about.subtitle: Creative innovation company leading Korea-Japan advertising market

content.paragraph1: neos Corporation has successfully led the role as a pioneer that directed Japan's advertising market, the nearest neighboring country, to the domestic market within the rapidly changing advertising video market, serving as a bridgehead connecting Korea and Japan. Beyond this, through continuous monitoring and communication, we have reached an influential position in the advertising video production market through close networks and extensive business positioning between Korea and Japan.
content.paragraph2: neos Corporation established a management business division in 2010 and launched neos Entertainment as a subsidiary in 2013. We provide the best services to advertisers by building quality infrastructure with influential actors and utilizing and integrating new businesses. We are also creating an environment where capable actors can be nurtured, increasing recognition within the industry.
content.paragraph3: In 2018, neos Corporation established neostory, a new content business division, through partnerships with leading creators in Japan and Asia in line with the trends of 'Korean Wave' and 'Content'. In 2021, we established neostory Corporation.
content.paragraph4: We will create content such as internet comics and novels called webtoons and visualize them to collaborate with various people and present them to the world.
content.paragraph5: The neos Group will continue to play a leading role in new markets that have never been experienced before.

neosEntertainment.description: Systematic talent management services through influential actor groups

neostory.description: Global webtoon & content production with Korea-Japan simultaneous releases

noResults.title: No projects match the selected filters

ccjcQooTwice.title: CCJC Qoo / TWICE
ccjcQooTwice.description: Creative direction and overall production management for CCJC Qoo brand campaign featuring global K-POP girl group TWICE. Delivered integrated marketing solutions combining brand messaging with TWICE's vibrant energy and global appeal for the Japanese market

misamoGoogle.title: Google x MISAMO
misamoGoogle.description: Creative direction and overall production management for an innovative global campaign collaboration between Japanese representative girl group MISAMO and Google. Delivered integrated marketing solutions perfectly fusing brand messaging with K-POP artist identity

sbc.title: SBC Brand Campaign
sbc.description: Strategic creative direction and overall production management for powerful brand message delivery. Comprehensive campaign planning and production for innovative visual storytelling and brand identity enhancement

momoMediQttO.title: MediQttO x MOMO
momoMediQttO.description: Creative direction and overall production management for K-POP star MOMO and MediQttO's Asian market expansion project. Established and executed integrated marketing strategies combining global K-POP artist brand value with product characteristics

senka.title: SENKA Creative Campaign
senka.description: Creative direction and overall production management for Shiseido SENKA brand's Asian market targeting project. Innovative advertising content planning and production reflecting brand identity and target customer lifestyle

kara.title: Chung Jung One Red Vinegar x KARA
kara.description: Creative direction and overall production management for K-POP group KARA and Chung Jung One red vinegar brand campaign. Created new brand value through the fusion of traditional brands and K-POP, executing integrated marketing strategies

paradiseCityParkSeojun.title: Paradise City x Park Seo-jun
paradiseCityParkSeojun.description: Creative direction and overall production management for Paradise City Resort and actor Park Seo-jun's luxury brand campaign. High-end advertising content planning and production combining premium brand image with star appeal

paradiseCityCasino.title: Paradise City Casino x Park Seo-jun
paradiseCityCasino.description: Creative direction and overall production management for Paradise City Casino's premium brand campaign. Provided luxury marketing solutions for differentiated brand experiences in luxury entertainment spaces

bibigoParkSeojun.title: Bibigo x Park Seo-jun
bibigoParkSeojun.description: Creative direction and overall production management for CJ Bibigo and actor Park Seo-jun's global K-food brand campaign. Established and executed integrated marketing strategies combining global appeal of Korean traditional food with star's approachability

nikeAbcmartEnhypen.title: Nike x ABC Mart x ENHYPEN
nikeAbcmartEnhypen.description: Creative direction and overall production management for Nike and ABC Mart's ENHYPEN collaboration sneaker campaign. Executed young generation-targeted marketing strategies maximizing synergy between global sports brands and K-POP

glidicTxt.title: GLIDiC x TOMORROW X TOGETHER
glidicTxt.description: Creative direction and overall production management for GLIDiC earphone brand and TOMORROW X TOGETHER's global campaign. Created innovative brand experiences through the combination of audio technology and K-POP culture

t1419Debut.title: T1419 Debut Promotion Video
t1419Debut.description: Creative direction and overall production management for rookie boy group T1419's debut project. Integrated planning and production of music videos and promotional content capturing the artist's unique identity and musical concept

t1419EdelHouse.title: T1419 x Edel House
t1419EdelHouse.description: Creative direction and overall production management for T1419 and cosmetics brand Edel House collaboration campaign. Established and executed young generation-targeted marketing strategies through synergy between K-POP artists and beauty brands

orbitUniverse.title: ORBIT Japan 'UNIVERSE' Project
orbitUniverse.description: Creative direction and overall production management for LOONA's Japanese fan club ORBIT's special project. Unique video content planning and production combining fandom culture with artist's worldview

nuestDrive.title: NU'EST Japan 'DRIVE' MV
nuestDrive.description: Creative direction and overall production management for NU'EST Japan activities 'DRIVE' music video. High-quality video content production reflecting the artist's musical message and Japanese market's cultural characteristics

izoneVampire.title: IZ*ONE Japan 'Vampire' MV
izoneVampire.description: Creative direction and overall production management for IZ*ONE Japan activities 'Vampire' music video. Innovative music video planning and production combining the group's unique concept with Japanese market trends

jejuAirTvxq.title: Jeju Air x TVXQ
jejuAirTvxq.description: Creative direction and overall production management for Jeju Air and TVXQ brand collaboration advertising campaign. Provided integrated marketing solutions combining airline brand reliability with K-POP stars' global appeal

nikeAbcmart2019.title: 2019 Nike ABC Mart
nikeAbcmart2019.description: Creative direction and overall production management for Nike and ABC Mart's 2019 brand campaign. Executed integrated marketing strategies maximizing synergy between sports brand innovation and retail partnerships
